DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; WAKE_UP , AMIGO
DOC.TEXT: Culture Shock , Day I : An ESPN commentator in Chicago , explaining the importance of soccer to most of the world , cited the case of Bolivia . Bolivians celebrated their country ' s first Cup qualification with two joyous days of siesta , said he . Si , senor , siesta . Makes you wonder , doesn ' t it ? If you invite that guy to your next fiesta -- will he come_in pajamas ? WILLIAM D . MONTALBANO
